name: Create Primary Broker and Broker Agency
description:
In order for Brokers to help SHOP employees only
  The Primary Broker must create and manage an account on the HBX for their organization.
  Such organizations are referred to as a Broker Agency
  The Primary Broker should be able to create a Broker Agency account application
  The HBX Admin should be able to approve the application and send an email invite
  The Primary Broker should receive the invite and create an Account
  The Employer should be able to select the Primary Broker as their Broker
  The Broker should be able to manage that Employer
  The Broker should be able to select a family covered by that Employer
  The Broker should be able to purchase insurance for that family

name: Assign General Agency Staff to General Agency

elements.name: General Staff has not signed up on the HBX

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market

they click the 'New General Agency' button

GA staff enters his personal information
GA staff searches for General Agency which exists in EA
GA staff should see a list of General Agencies searched and selects his agency
GA staff submits his application and see successful message
Max Planck logs on to the General Agency Portal
there is a Staff with a “pending” general agency staff role in the table
the primary staff clicks on the approve button
the primary staff should see an approval popup
the primary staff clicks on continue and approve button
the primary staff should see the staff successfully approved message
new ga staff should receive an email
the primary staff logs out
new ga staff visits the link received in the approval email
they should see an account creation form
new ga staff completes the account creation form and hit the 'Submit' button
they should see a welcome message
they see the General Agency homepage
the primary staff logs out
Max Planck logs on to the General Agency Portal
the primary staff removes ga staff from ga staff table
the primary staff should see the staff successfully removed message
the primary staff logs out

person record exists for John Doe

the primary staff clicks on the “Add General Agency Staff Role” button
a form appears that requires the primary staff to input First Name, Last Name, and DOB to submit
the primary staff enters the First Name, Last Name, and DOB of existing user John Doe
the primary staff will be given a general agency staff role with the given General Agency Agency
the primary staff will now appear within the “General Agency Staff” table as Active and Linked
